title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 180/84 of 25 January 1984 extending the suspension of the non-transferability of rights arising from export licences in the milk and milk products sector provided for in Regulation (EEC) No 2729/81
header:
COMMISSION  REGULATION (EEC) No 180/84
of 25 January 1984
extending the suspension of the non-transferability of rights arising from export licences in the milk and milk product sector provided for in Regulation (EEC) No 2729/81
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN
COMMUNITIES
main_body: In Article 1 of Regulation (EEC) No 664/83 '31 March 1984' is hereby replaced by '31 March 1985'.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the third day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 25 January 1984.
For the Commission
Poul DALSAGER
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 148, 28. 6. 1968, p. 13.
(2) OJ No L 163, 22. 6. 1983, p. 56.
(3) OJ No L 272, 26. 9. 1981, p. 19.
(4) OJ No L 351, 14. 12. 1983, p. 11.
(5) OJ No L 338, 13. 12. 1980, p. 1.
(6) OJ No L 283, 6. 10. 1982, p. 7.
(7) OJ No L 78, 24. 3. 1983, p. 13.
